MemeDef.label: isolationist
MemeDef.description: Trust is a resource in low supply, as everyone we meet is the enemy.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->The people of the [place_summary] [place_name] squabbled endlessly among themselves, and [deity0_name] became tired of discord and anointed [memberNamePlural] as the only rightful rulers of every living being.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Isolationist) ->The faithful fought the unbelievers, and [deity0_name] said, "Fight them, everywhere, for they are your enemy, and peace with them was never an option"

intro(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->The people of the [place_summary] [place_name] worshipped [deity0_name]. [deity0_pronoun] saw that they were suited for [memeConcept], and ordained that they shall be the only faction worthy of ascension.

conflict(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->A [foeLeader] passed a law forbidding [memberNamePlural] from rising to the ruling classes of [place_name]. As such, [memberNamePlural] began to conspire and create hidden, secret alliances.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->A warrior named [founderName] used [place_massWeapon] to destroy a [place_community]. [deity0_name] saw [founderName]'s ruthlessness told [founder_objective] to lead a life of isolation and secrecy.

victory(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->[founderName] destroyed the capital of [place_name] with [place_massWeapon], killing the [foeLeader]. [founder_pronoun] did not take [founder_possessive] place as ruler of [place_name] - instead, [founderName] went into hiding.

setup(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->[founderName] built an army that spread [founder_possessive] power and glory across the land, placing those who refused to follow rightly at the end of [founder_possessive] knife.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Isolationist) ->[founderName] instructed all outsiders to fight to the death, as peace was never an option. When the first city refused and begged to join [founder_objective], [founder_pronoun] used [place_massWeapon] to kill everyone inside.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->I looked at this [foeLeader], with [foeLeader_possessive] pitiful [foeSoldiers], all that power left fallow. I tried to convince [foeLeader_objective] that
lesson(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->we've long since proven that we have the strength to strike from the shadows, isolated but not weakened
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->That's why we're proud to express the strength of our hearts using the edges of our blades and the heads of our hammers.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->It took the most superior humans to create the archotechs. With being as powerful as them, it's only proper that we hide in the shadows.
archistFact(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->The archotechs can wipe us out without hesitation - just as we should wipe out our enemies.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->The archotechs will never take us to join them - and we should never give this opportunity to our enemies.
animistFact(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->Powerful spirits of [spiritElement] decide who is fit to rule, and lend power to their chosen when they slay others.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Isolationist) ->[itIsSaid] that a new order will be created when one supreme ruler emerges from the shadows on a planet filled to the brim with blood and viscera.
